text: Wilt W Moore was a Canadian international lawn bowls player who competed in the 1930 British Empire Games. ==Bowls career== At the 1930 British Empire Games he won the bronze medal in the pairs event with his Vancouver teammate Arthur Reid. ==References== Category:Canadian male bowls players Category:Bowls players at the 1930 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Canada Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Wilt Moore
